issue.title: namu.wiki

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# 죄송합니다. Umanle S.R.L.가 AdGuard의 광고 차단을 방해하고 있습니다.

나무위키 운영사인 Umanle S.R.L.가 나무위키의 DOM 구조를 관련된 필터 업데이트가 있을 때 마다 변경하므로 필터로 차단하기에는 오차단이 발생할 수 있습니다.

또한, Umanle S.R.L.가 기술적인 안티-애드블록하여 의도적으로 나무위키 문서를 읽을 수 없게 했던 점과 전용 유저스크립트인 NamuLink의 차단 방법을 우회하게끔 네이버 파워링크 광고 알고리즘을 업데이트합니다.

## 유저스크립트 설치

[NamuLink 유저스크립트](https://github.com/List-KR/NamuLink)를 설치하여 나무위키의 파워링크 광고를 차단하실 수 있습니다.
한국어로 작성되어 있는 설치 방법은 [이 URL](https://community.list-kr.com/docs/AdGuard/Userscripts/NamuLink)를 클릭하여 확인해주세요.


## 그래도 문제가 있으신가요?
유저스크립트를 사용했을 때 발생하는 문제는 [이 이슈 트래커](https://github.com/List-KR/NamuLink/issues)로 알려주세요.
기타 문제는 [이 곳](https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues)으로 알려주세요.
GitHub 이슈를 사용하시기 어렵다면, filters@adguard.com 로 문의해주세요.

issue.title: picrew.me

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# Sorry. The website is infected by AdShield, Inc.

Unfortunately, It is complicated to resolve with a regular adblock rule because the website is being protected by service of Ad-Shield that is an anti-adblock professional company.
Ad-Shield receives up to 700 000 000 KRW per 2 year from tech foundation support program of South Korean government.

These records can be verified at [here](https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues?q=label%3Aad-shield+).
You can check the fact that support of South Korean government at [here](https://www.venturesquare.net/857777).

## Userscript Installation
Please block Ad-Shield advertisement by installing [microShield userscript](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield).
Please check its installation guideline written in English by visiting [this URL](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/blob/main/README.md).

If you can understand Korean language, please refer https://community.list-kr.com/docs/AdGuard/Userscripts/microShield.

## Still Have a Problem?
An issue is occurred when the userscript is applied, please report to [this issue tracker](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/issues).
Please report to [here](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/175394) if other issue.

issue.title: e.mail.ru

labels.name: Extra
labels.description: Issues, related to AdGuard Extra extension

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
Известно, что эта проблема решается с помощью AdGuard Extra.

Если вы пользуетесь AdGuard на устройствах Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включена в настройках приложения.

Если вы используете расширение AdGuard для браузера, рекомендуется также установить AdGuard Extra.

* [Установка на браузеры Chrome, Edge или другие, основанные на Chromium](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Установка на Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
Известно, что эта проблема решается с помощью AdGuard Extra.

Если вы пользуетесь AdGuard на устройствах Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включена в настройках приложения.

Если вы используете расширение AdGuard для браузера, рекомендуется также установить AdGuard Extra.

* [Установка на браузеры Chrome, Edge или другие, основанные на Chromium](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Установка на Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

comment.body: Не повторяется. Ознакомьтесь с первым [постом](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/181688#issue-2360215541).

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://manhuatop.org/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fmanhuatop.org%2F) ### Comment > If on the website, clicking on a chapter will open up a pop up ad every time. Sometimes even touching the page will open a new tab and it opens ads. This did not used to happen and has only been happening in the last few weeks across lots of similar websites that it didn't used to before. I've tried updating etc but it keeps opening new tabs with ads whenever uou try and read any new chapter. The screenshot only shows the tab that opened up when I clicked on a chapter but not the loaded page because the url keeps going up in number and I get rid of it before it fully loads because it looks suspicious. comment.body:
> blocks leftovers from ad

That blocks too many. `vtuber-matomeruyon.blog.jp##.plugin-memo:last-child` is fine, but nowadays I'm no longer willing to use such rules much after seeing many FPs - these sites change structure too often. Maybe `blog.jp##.plugin-memo:has(> div.side > script[src^="https://js.ad-"])` but this won't work on apps.

Fix #182072 belarus-news.by

To block a Telegram channel banner, the site has too few visitors: [60.8K](https://www.similarweb.com/website/belarus-news.by)

comment.body: У сайта за март ~200K, апрель ~250K, в июне будет ещё больше, потому что телеканал транслирует ЧЕ по футболу-2024.

fixed.

labels.name: NSFW
labels.description: Nudes and porn sites

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [NSFW] [https://erommd-street.com/%e9%9b%85%e5%8a%aa%e6%96%af-happy-halloween/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Ferommd-street.com%2F%25e9%259b%2585%25e5%258a%25aa%25e6%2596%25af-happy-halloween%2F) ### Comment > The issue stems from iPhone's Adguard not properly handling iframes. There is no rule to hide the ad placeholders. On PCs, blocking the script results in a size of zero. However, on iPhones, because the iframe remains, it's natural that the ad frame does not disappear. If there are other causes for this issue, I would appreciate learning about them for future reference. > > ``` >

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [NSFW] [https://ero3dmovie.net/%e3%80%90kancolle%e3%80%91atlanta-invites-a-stranger-in/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fero3dmovie.net%2F%25e3%2580%2590kancolle%25e3%2580%2591atlanta-invites-a-stranger-in%2F) ### Comment > Adguard on iPhone is experiencing an issue with handling iframes, which results in the inability to hide ad placeholders. Unlike on PC, where blocking the script makes the ad frame disappear, the iframe remains on iPhone, making it natural for the ad frame to still be visible. comment.body:
> Adguard on iPhone is experiencing an issue with handling iframes, which results in the inability to hide ad placeholders.

Moreover - because of the iOS bug related to the Content Blockng API, this problem will be worsened. Now a part of critical rules is being discarded by the system, and a temporary solution may be to discard a part of cosmetic rules on our side.

issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: NSFW
labels.description: Nudes and porn sites

issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS. 


Previous issue https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/172033

issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: NSFW
labels.description: Nudes and porn sites

issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS. 


Previous issue https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/172033

issue.body:
# 죄송합니다. 해당 웹 사이트는 애드쉴드(AdShield, Inc)에 의해 감염되었습니다.

안타깝게도 이 웹 사이트는 안티 애드블록 전문 회사인 애드쉴드의 서비스에 의해 보호받고 있어 일반적인 애드블록 규칙로는 처리가 까다롭습니다.
애드쉴드는 대한민국 정부의 기술 창업 지원 프로그램으로부터 최대 2년에 7억원을 받습니다.

이러한 기록은 [여기](https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues?q=label%3Aad-shield+)에서 검증하실 수 있습니다.
대한민국 정부의 지원 사실은 [여기](https://www.venturesquare.net/857777)에서 확인하실 수 있습니다.

## 유저스크립트 설치
[microShield 유저스크립트](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield)를 설치하여 애드쉴드 광고를 차단하시길 바랍니다.
한국어로 작성되어 있는 설치 가이드라인은 [이 URL](https://community.list-kr.com/docs/AdGuard/Userscripts/microShield)를 방문하여 확인해주세요.


## 그래도 문제가 있으신가요?
유저스크립트를 사용했을 때 발생하는 문제는 [이 이슈 트래커](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/issues)로 알려주세요.
기타 문제는 [이 곳](https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues)으로 알려주세요.
GitHub 이슈를 사용하시기 어렵다면, filters@adguard.com 로 문의해주세요.

issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: NSFW
labels.description: Nudes and porn sites

issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS. 


Previous issue https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/172033

comment.body:
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/178790#issuecomment-2198590096 - That's probably related to - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardBrowserExtension/issues/2372 and extension is loaded too late (reloading website should fixes it).

<hr>

https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/178790#issuecomment-2198619182 - This is about new ads, it's fixed by JS rule, but the problem is that extension for Firefox cannot download/update JS rules.
I will try to add `$replace` rule.

Если вы пользуетесь AdGuard на устройствах Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включена в настройках приложения.

Если вы используете расширение AdGuard для браузера, рекомендуется также установить AdGuard Extra.

issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: NSFW
labels.description: Nudes and porn sites

issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS. 


Previous issue https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/172033

comment.body:
1. Project Configuration
Configuration in .NET Core is very different from what we’re used to in .NET Framework projects. We don’t use the web.config file anymore, but instead, use a built-in Configuration framework that comes out of the box in .NET Core. To be able to develop good applications, we need to understand how to configure our application and its services first.

Ultimate ASP.NET Core Web API,Ultimate ASP.NET Core Web API SECOND EDITION,
Marinko Spasojevic,Vladimir Pecanac - CodeMaze - Premium

comment.body:
Cannot reproduce with your settings. 
Please try to disable-enable content blockers in Safari settings and restart Safari, and check for filters update.

------

Also you may try this, if AdGuard is not detected on https://adguard.com/test.html

Follow the steps below to fully uninstall AdGuard for Safari: 
1. Uncheck all AdGuard for Safari extensions in **Safari -> Preferences -> Extensions** (if available)
2. Open **Finder** and press Shift+Command+G
    - Remove AdGuardSafariApp folder from **~/Library/Application Support** directory
    - Remove from **~/Library/Containers** - all directories started with AdGuard-
    - Remove TC3Q7MAJXF.com.adguard.safari.AdGuard folder from **~/Library/GroupContainers** directory
    - Remove com.adguard.safari.AdGuard.plist from **~/Library/Preferences** 
3. Open **Activity Monitor** and force quit all "cfprefsd" processes 
4. Remove AdGuard for Safari from **Applications**
